PHRASE.LANG: You've tamed the ice elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
Vous avez apprivoisé la glace élémentaire de dragon d'Avalon! Maintenant, il sera toujours votre compagnon.[#Legal]
Du hast den Eis-Element-Drachen von Avalon gezähmt! Nun wird er für immer dein Gefährte sein.[#Legal]
Hai domato il ghiaccio elementare drago di Avalon! Ora sarà per sempre il vostro compagno.[#Legal]
Usted ha domesticado el hielo elemental dragón de Avalon! Ahora bien, siempre será su compañero.[#Legal]
You've tamed the ice elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
You've tamed the ice elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
You've tamed the ice elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
You've tamed the ice elemental dragon of Avalon! Now it will forever be your companion.[#Legal]
